text:
<!everyone> happy friday folks!
---
i have some cool news today :sunglasses: i have a company willing to foot the bill for a few local superpath meetups this summer. selfishly, i'd like to do one in denver so i can go, but i'm thinking SF, Boston, Toronto and one other location too. we'll do this in conjunction with a few local slack channels. so where are my <#C025TCPL59D|colorado> folks at!? join that channel and we can start planning a time to hang out. and if you live in SF, Boston or Toronto and want to help me organize something in your city, let's talk.
---
okay, jobs!!!

*## featured roles:*
*---*
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/113362-customer-success-manager-onboarding-animalz|Customer Success Manager, Onboarding> (new :rocket:) <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/71794-content-strategist-animalz|Content Strategist>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19184-technical-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Technical Content Marketing Manager> (<@UM2A21SJW>)
• Shopify is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/105224-writercontent-marketing-manager-remote-shopify|Writer/Content Marketing Manager (remote>) (<@U02594B86Q0>)
• ChartMogul is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/97371-senior-analyst-saas-data-journalist-chartmogul|Senior Analyst (SaaS Data Journalist>)
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90483-director-of-content-marketing-verblio|Director of Content Marketing>
• Ripple is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/89671-content-marketing-manager-ripple|Content Marketing Manager>
• Great Question is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/65708-content-marketing-manager-great-question|Content Marketing Manager>
• Campfire Labs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/28744-head-of-content-and-community-campfire-labs|Head of Content & Community>, a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/29028-client-content-strategist-campfire-labs|Client Content Strategist> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/29030-staff-writer-campfire-labs|Staff Writer> (<@U01JKS2FESH>)
---
*and more from the job board & <#CJE3XC44V|-job-listings>:*
---
• Stranger Studios is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/111863-content-manager-stranger-studios|Content Manager>
• Solv is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/113412-content-marketing-manager-b2b-solv|Content Marketing Manager (B2B>)
• Modus Create is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/105201-content-strategist-modus-create|Content Strategist>
• Demostack is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90653-sales-enablement-author-wanted-demostack|sales enablement author>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90683-product-marketing-author-demostack|product marketing author> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90685-generalist-author-demostack|generalist author> (:wave: <@U016V6EHYMA>)
• Ramp is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90143-content-marketing-manager-ramp|Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@UQ079M31P> <@UQP2SP2BX>)
• edX is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1622740105042100|Social Media Co-op> (<@UJFCA8FAR>)
• Life School is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1622590848039500|Lead Researcher> (<@U01Q2H2LJA2>)
• Homeward is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1622561033037000|Copywriter> (<@U0162CX5SH1>)
• From The Future is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1622556566036700|Content Strategist> (<@U017B57MWSU>)
• Keeper Tax is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/84780-head-of-content-keeper-tax|Head of Content> ($100k to $140k plus a $15k/month budget)
• Tuff is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/82405-content-and-search-marketing-manager-tuff|Content and Search Marketing Manager>
• Socio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/78986-director-of-content-marketing-socio|Director of Content Marketing>
• Maven is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/83011-content-lead-content-marketing-lead-maven|Content Marketing Lead>
• Mailshake is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/74101-content-marketing-manager-mailshake|Content Marketing Manager>
• Greenlight Guru is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/73874-senior-b2b-content-writer-greenlight-guru|Senior B2B Content Writer>
• How to Cake It is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/72238-director-of-digital-marketing-how-to-cake-it|Director of Digital Marketing> (join the $100k club :moneybag:)
• Workvivo is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/70581-content-marketing-manager-workvivo|Content Marketing Manager>
• AppDynamics is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1621895592016000|Content Marketing Lead> (<@U022QJHJ118>)
• Paperform is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1621685855011300|Content Writer> (<@U01V5RMFERX>)
• Organic Growth Marketing (OGM) is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1621419365002700|Growth Advisor> (<@UU9PKQC7Q>)
• SingleCare is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1621359143001700|Freelance Writer>
• Megawatt Content Marketing is hiring a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC44V/p1621217055147200|Content Team Lead - B2B Tech>  (<@U01N4EQQTL6>)
---
have a great weekend!!
jimmy
